definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: He is currently visiting professor of planning at Oxford Brookes University.
sentences.chinese: 他現任牛津布魯克斯大學的城市規劃客座教授。

sentences.english: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亞大學的地質學客座教授。

sentences.english: Pro. Smith was attached to the medical college as a guest professor for two years.
sentences.chinese: 史女士教授在醫學院當了兩年的客座教授。

sentences.english: It was a bestseller in the US where Lao She was a visiting professor.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個暢銷，在美國如老舍是一個客座教授。

sentences.english: He has served as a visiting professor of finance at the Columbia University Graduate School of Business in New York.
sentences.chinese: 他還擔任了在紐約的哥倫比亞大學商學院的客座教授。

sentences.english: He is also a Distinguished Professor -at-Large at the Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 同時，他也是中國香港大學的客座教授。

sentences.english: Ms. Mingyue Dun is a visiting professor of Yanshan University.
sentences.chinese: 頓明月律師爲燕山大學客座教授。

sentences.english: I want to invite you to be our visiting professor.
sentences.chinese: 我想邀請您做我們的客座教授。

sentences.english: Until his death, he was a visiting professor at numerous American universities.
sentences.chinese: 直到去世爲止，他在許多美國大學裏都是客座教授。

definition: hired (for employment)/invited (e.g. to lecture)/engaged (for a task)/(in olden times) betrothal gift from the groom's family
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
